comment:
* Class used to verify whether the specified <var>ch</var> 
 * conforms to the XML 1.0 definition of whitespace. 
 * @xsl.usage internal

methods.name: public static boolean isWhiteSpace(char ch)
methods.comment: * Returns whether the specified ch conforms to the XML 1.0 definition * of whitespace. Refer to * the definition of S for details. * @param ch Character to check as XML whitespace. * @return =true if ch is XML whitespace; otherwise =false.

methods.name: public static boolean isWhiteSpace(char[] ch, int start, int length)
methods.comment:
* Tell if the string is whitespace.
   *
   * @param ch Character array to check as XML whitespace.
   * @param start Start index of characters in the array
   * @param length Number of characters in the array 
   * @return True if the characters in the array are 
   * XML whitespace; otherwise, false.

methods.name: public static boolean isWhiteSpace(StringBuffer buf)
methods.comment:
* Tell if the string is whitespace.
   *
   * @param buf StringBuffer to check as XML whitespace.
   * @return True if characters in buffer are XML whitespace, false otherwise

methods.name: public static boolean isWhiteSpace(String s)
methods.comment:
* Tell if the string is whitespace.
   *
   * @param s String to check as XML whitespace.
   * @return True if characters in buffer are XML whitespace, false otherwise

methodNames: public static boolean isWhiteSpace(char[] ch, int start, int length)
